name: Family Feud: Decades
overview: In Family Feud Decades, the most popular answers are still on the board. This time, the most popular questions are in the game! Family Feud Decades is a game show greatest hits collection, featuring a smorgasbord of questions from the Feud's four-decade history. Tackle thousands of real Family Feud survey questions from the '70s, '80s, '90s, and 2000s. Play on classic Family Feud sets that feature retro decorations and scoreboards. You'll be able to create a character to match using a selection of outfits and hairstyles inspired by each era. What are you waiting for? Let's play the Feud!
